errors.6.1.2-2: REASON: this required byte value greater than 127 at the beginning of a file seemingly only appears in the ISO 19005-1:2005 spec and no other public one
errors.6.1.3-1: REASON: fpdf2 does not currently define a file /ID in the trailer section
errors.6.2.3-2: REASON: fpdf2 does not currently support defining ICC profiles
errors.6.2.3-4: REASON: fpdf2 does not currently support defining ICC profiles
errors.6.3.4-1: REASON: fpdf2 still allows using the PostScript standard 14 fonts. Quoting PDF 1.7 spec from 2006: Beginning with PDF 1.5, the special treatment given to the standard 14 fonts is deprecated. All fonts used in a PDF document should be represented using a com- plete font descriptor. For backwards capability, viewer applications must still provide the special treatment identified for the standard 14 fonts.
errors.6.7.2-1: REASON: fpdf2 does not currently support setting XML/XMP metadata. Check docs/Metadata.md to see how set metadata using pikepdf.
errors.6.7.3-1: REASON: fpdf2 does not currently support setting XML/XMP metadata. Check docs/Metadata.md to see how set metadata using pikepdf.
